description: This file provides logging configuration utilities for a service, including a function to set up logging levels and formats, and to configure uvicorn-specific log levels.

methods.name: None configure_logging(log_level: str, *, uvicorn_log_level: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Configures the application's logging system with specified log levels, including optional configuration of uvicorn's loggers.

ctags.name: configure_logging
ctags.pattern: /^def configure_logging(log_level: str, *, uvicorn_log_level: Optional[str] = None) -> None:$/
